description: Using wraps instead of homemade dough make this Turkish inspired dish an weeknight winner. Even kale haters will be won over by the filling with added haloumi.
name: Kale & Haloumi Gozleme Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 bunch kale, stems removed and leaves chopped
0.5 bunch mint, leaves picked and coarsely chopped
1 tbs vegetable oil (and extra for frying)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a large frying pan over medium heat with 2 tsp vegetable oil. Add kale and garlic. Season with salt and pepper. Stir constantly for 2-3 minutes or until kale is wilted. Transfer to a bowl and allow to cool.
Add haloumi, shallots, mint, nutmeg sumac (optional) and chilli flakes (optional) to the cooled kale mixture. Stir well to combine.

Lay out 4 of the wraps and divide the filling between them. Leave a bit of a border around the edge to avoid the filling oozing out and burning in the pan. Place the remaining 4 wraps on top of each like a sandwich to create the gozleme.
Place 2 large frypans on medium-low heat. Add a bit of oil to the pan and cook each gozleme for 2-3 mins each side or until golden. Cut each gozleme into quarters and serve with lemon wedges. Enjoy.
